title: Genesys International likely to bag orders worth Rs 200 crore from automakers
description: The market for navigation maps and connected car solutions in India is currently valued at about Rs 180-200 crore and is projected to reach Rs 500-600 crore in the next 3-4 years. Genesys International aims to capture a significant market share in the automotive mapping sector, which is growing rapidly.
